forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely and a few thunderstorms this morning, then more periods of rain during the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Higher wind gusts possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely and a few thunderstorms this morning, then more periods of rain during the afternoon. High 59F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 10C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 49F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 60F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 50F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 44F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 56F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 56F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 57F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High near 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 59F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
